name: International Conference on NEXT GENERATION COMPUTING TECHNOLOGIES
content: The aim of the conference is to have a special theme on Smart and Innovative Trends for Next Generation Computing Technologies. This conference could serve as a good platform to bring together Practitioners and researchers of the IT industry, Government, Academia and students of different disciplines and discuss about the trends in next generation computing. A large number of next generation technologies have emerged during last few years which have completely changed the computing and communication world. Today, social media, smartphones, cloud computing, virtualization and many other new technologies has been playing a vital role in our day to day life. This conference helps people across the world to share and exchange ideas of various computing technologies in coming future. We also give opportunity to young researchers to present their research work in a this platform.
organizers: Sankara College of Science and Commerce
